email_template.subject: Invitation to Interview for AI Engineer Position at Zelora Tech
email_template.body:
Dear MATHUSHA SIVAANANTHAN,

We were impressed by your strong background in machine learning engineering and experience in generative AI, LLM deployment, and prompt engineering. We believe your skills and expertise would be a great fit for our team at Zelora Tech, and we are excited to invite you for an interview for the AI Engineer position.

We have scheduled an interview for Thursday, February 05, 2026 at 4:00 PM (IST), which will last for 1 hour. We would be delighted if you could join us at this time. Could you please confirm your availability for this scheduled time slot?

We look forward to speaking with you and exploring how you can contribute to our team's success.

Best regards,
The Zelora Tech Talent Team
hr@zeloratech.com
